document_data.name: Frosted Mushroom
document_data.mainbody: '''Frosted mushrooms''' were a species of blue [[fungi]], always covered in a thin icy layer of frost. These mushrooms were highly sought after for their use in combat and chilling properties.
document_data.Powers: These mushrooms released freezing cold spores when crushed in a burst. When they were used on the battlefield, they could leave targets frost-burned and slowed by the sheer cold released with the spore burst.
document_data.History: In the mid-to-late-15{{th}} century [[DR]], frosted mushrooms could be purchased from the [[Mercenary Arms Depot]] in [[Neverwinter]].
